mapper.select: SELECT g.group_code as group_code , d.detail_code as detail_code , d.detail_name as detail_name , d.note as note FROM tb_group_code g LEFT JOIN tb_detail_code d ON g.group_code = d.group_code WHERE 1=1 AND g.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT mn_no, mbr_no, mn_dtm, mn_use_dvs, ( SELECT detail_name FROM tb_detail_code WHERE 1=1 AND mn_use_dvs = detail_code ) AS mn_use_dvs_name, mn_pay_dvs, mn_use_dvs_det, ( SELECT detail_name FROM tb_detail_code WHERE 1=1 AND mn_use_dvs_det = detail_code ) AS mn_use_dvs_det_name, mn_use_memo, mn_rgst_dtm, mn_rgst_id, mn_upd_dtm, mn_upd_id, mn_amount FROM tb_mn WHERE 1=1
AND mn_no = #{mn_no}
